servers.description: Docdex is a lightweight, local documentation indexer/search daemon. It runs per-project, keeps an on-disk index of your markdown/text docs, and serves top-k snippets over HTTP or CLI for any coding assistant or toolâ€”no external services or uploads required.

DOCDEX_CHROOT.description: (Unix) Chroot into path before serving; repo/state paths must exist inside that jail.

DOCDEX_TLS_KEY.description: Serve HTTPS with the provided key file path.

DOCDEX_TLS_CERT.description: Serve HTTPS with the provided cert file path.

DOCDEX_ALLOW_IPS.description: Optional comma-separated IPs/CIDRs allowed to reach the HTTP API (default: loopback-only in secure mode; allow all when secure mode is disabled).

DOCDEX_MAX_LIMIT.description: Clamp HTTP limit to at most n (default: 8).

DOCDEX_STATE_DIR.description: Override index storage path (relative paths are resolved under repo).

DOCDEX_ACCESS_LOG.description: Emit minimal structured access logs with query values redacted (default: true).

DOCDEX_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Bearer token required in secure mode (default); omit only when starting with --secure-mode=false.

DOCDEX_RUN_AS_GID.description: (Unix) Drop privileges to the provided GID after startup prep.

DOCDEX_RUN_AS_UID.description: (Unix) Drop privileges to the provided UID after startup prep.

DOCDEX_REQUIRE_TLS.description: Default true. Enforce TLS for non-loopback binds; set to false when TLS is already terminated by a trusted proxy.

DOCDEX_SECURE_MODE.description: Default true; when enabled, requires an auth token, loopback allowlist by default, and default rate limiting (60 req/min).

DOCDEX_UNSHARE_NET.description: (Linux only) Unshare the network namespace before serving (requires CAP_SYS_ADMIN/root); no-op on other platforms.

DOCDEX_EXCLUDE_DIRS.description: Extra directory names to skip anywhere in the tree (comma-separated).

DOCDEX_DOWNLOAD_REPO.description: If you publish from a fork, set DOCDEX_DOWNLOAD_REPO=<owner/repo> before installing so the downloader fetches your release assets.

DOCDEX_INSECURE_HTTP.description: Allow plain HTTP on non-loopback binds even when TLS is enforced (only use behind a trusted proxy).

DOCDEX_AUDIT_LOG_PATH.description: Write audit log JSONL to this path (default: <state-dir>/audit.log).

DOCDEX_CERTBOT_DOMAIN.description: Point TLS at /etc/letsencrypt/live/<domain>/{fullchain.pem,privkey.pem} (Certbot). Conflicts with manual --tls-*.

DOCDEX_AUDIT_MAX_BYTES.description: Rotate audit log after this many bytes (default: 5_000_000).

DOCDEX_AUDIT_MAX_FILES.description: Keep at most this many rotated audit files (default: 5).

DOCDEX_MAX_QUERY_BYTES.description: Reject requests whose query string exceeds n bytes (default: 4096).

DOCDEX_CERTBOT_LIVE_DIR.description: Use a specific Certbot live dir containing fullchain.pem and privkey.pem.

DOCDEX_RATE_LIMIT_BURST.description: Optional burst capacity for the rate limiter (defaults to per-minute limit when 0).

DOCDEX_MAX_REQUEST_BYTES.description: Reject requests whose Content-Length or size hint exceeds n bytes (default: 16384).
